scripts.deploy: run-s cleanup build install-modules sls-deploy cleanup
scripts.deploy-core: npm run cleanup && npm run build && bash installmodules.sh && sls deploy function --function core && npm run cleanup
scripts.deploy-refresh: npm run cleanup && npm run build && bash installmodules.sh && sls deploy function --function refreshfeeds && npm run cleanup
scripts.deploy-prod: run-s cleanup build install-modules sls-deploy-production cleanup
